ppy/osu-server-beatmap-submission.summary: Recent activities have focused on optimizing package-related operations, including the use of versioning database tables and checking for meaningful changes before performing updates. Additionally, submission-relevant events are now added to the database via LIO endpoints, improving the overall efficiency and data tracking of the repository.

ppy/osu.summary: The repository has seen recent updates aimed at fixing issues with hitcircle sprites in certain skins, particularly since the last release. A pull request was submitted to address this problem by re-examining the use of providers for sprite availability checks, ensuring compatibility with various skins and closing a related issue.
